2025 St. Louis Cardinals Statistics

2024 Season

Record: 42-36, 3rd place in NL_Central (Schedule and Results)

Playoff Odds: 29.9% to make postseason, 0.7% to win World Series

Manager: Oliver Marmol (42-36)

President: John Mozeliak (President, Baseball Operations)

Farm Director: Larry Day

Scouting Director: Randy Flores

Ballpark: Busch Stadium III

Attendance: 1,172,880 (9th of 15)

Park Factors: (Over 100 favors batters, under 100 favors pitchers.)
    Multi-year: Batting - 100, Pitching - 100
    One-year: Batting - 98, Pitching - 97

Pythagorean W-L: 42-36, 366 Runs, 332 Runs Allowed
